data.title: Church in Bloomington Indiana
data.meta_description: We are a Christian church in Bloomington IN that is multicultural, multigenerational, and nondenominational. City Church is focused on building families and changing lives.
data.text:
sunday at 8:30am, 10:00am & 11:45am

A Christian church in Bloomington, IN.

We are multicultural, multigenerational, and nondenominational.

what people are saying

What makes City Church unique from other churches in Bloomington IN?

Check out below and watch other stories of real-life change.

Amazing atmosphere that I felt very comfortable in and will definitely be returning!

Marsha

Very welcoming church. Makes me feel part of their family. Wonderful church!

Yvette

My favorite place to go! City is my home!

jessica

Very friendly and super safe during covid 19 times.

RAE

Amazing, wonderful loving community. If you can’t go in person, watch on YouTube!!

Carlo

Best church I’ve been to.

Roxanne

We love it at City Church.

Dennis

An amazing church that accepts everyone. No matter where you are in life you are accepted and loved with open arms!

Correna

It’s a great church with an amazing worship service.

Matthew

Great place to learn about God and be connected to people from all backgrounds. A nonjudgement atmosphere that allows an individual to grow at their own pace.

Randy

Through attending small groups and being a part of the Dream Team, it makes a big church feel much smaller. I have grown more in my walk with the Lord in the past 3 years than any other time in my life.

Megan

The people are so full of love and want to get to know you. The worship team is so powerful and talented. We also love that the preaching is relatable and helps us apply the Word of God to our lives.

Sara
